1: הִנֵּ֧ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Behold the LORD</n> בּוֹקֵ֥ק <sup>1238 </sup> <n>empty</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>maketh the earth</n> וּבֽוֹלְקָ֑הּ <sup>1110 </sup> <n>and maketh it waste</n> וְעִוָּ֣ה <sup>5753 </sup> <n>and turneth</n> פָנֶ֔יהָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>it upside down</n> וְהֵפִ֖יץ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>and scattereth abroad</n> יֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>the inhabitants</n>
2: וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And it shall be as with the people</n> כַּכֹּהֵ֔ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>so with the priest</n> כַּעֶ֙בֶד֙ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>as with the servant</n> כַּֽאדֹנָ֔יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>so with his master</n> כַּשִּׁפְחָ֖ה <sup>8198 </sup> <n>as with the maid</n> כַּגְּבִרְתָּ֑הּ <sup>1404 </sup> <n>so with her mistress</n> כַּקּוֹנֶה֙ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>as with the buyer</n> כַּמּוֹכֵ֔ר <sup>4376 </sup> <n>so with the seller</n> כַּמַּלְוֶה֙ <sup>3867 </sup> <n>as with the lender</n> כַּלֹּוֶ֔ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>so with the borrower</n> כַּנֹּשֶׁ֕ה <sup>5383 </sup> <n>as with the taker of usury</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>so</n> נֹשֶׁ֥א <sup>5378 </sup> <n>with the giver of usury</n> בֽוֹ׃
3: הִבּ֧וֹק ׀ <sup>1238 </sup> <n>shall be utterly</n> תִּבּ֛וֹק <sup>1238 </sup> <n>emptied</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>The land</n> וְהִבּ֣וֹז ׀ <sup>962 </sup> <n>and utterly</n> תִּבּ֑וֹז <sup>962 </sup> <n>spoiled</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> דִּבֶּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath spoken</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>this word</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
4: אָבְלָ֤ה <sup>56 </sup> <n>mourneth</n> נָֽבְלָה֙ <sup>5034 </sup> <n>[and] fadeth away</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>The earth</n> אֻמְלְלָ֥ה <sup>535 </sup> <n>languisheth</n> נָבְלָ֖ה <sup>5034 </sup> <n>[and] fadeth away</n> תֵּבֵ֑ל <sup>8398 </sup> <n>the world</n> אֻמְלָ֖לוּ <sup>535 </sup> <n>do languish</n> מְר֥וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>the haughty</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
5: וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>The earth</n> חָנְפָ֖ה <sup>2610 </sup> <n>also is defiled</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>under the inhabitants</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָבְר֤וּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>thereof because they have transgressed</n> תוֹרֹת֙ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>the laws</n> חָ֣לְפוּ <sup>2498 </sup> <n>changed</n> חֹ֔ק <sup>2706 </sup> <n>the ordinance</n> הֵפֵ֖רוּ <sup>6565 </sup> <n>broken</n> בְּרִ֥ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>the everlasting</n>
6: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> אָלָה֙ <sup>423 </sup> <n>Therefore hath the curse</n> אָ֣כְלָה <sup>398 </sup> <n>devoured</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וַֽיֶּאְשְׁמ֖וּ <sup>816 </sup> <n>therein are desolate</n> יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and they that dwell</n> בָ֑הּ עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> חָרוּ֙ <sup>2787 </sup> <n>are burned</n> יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>therefore the inhabitants</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְנִשְׁאַ֥ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>left</n> אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> מִזְעָֽר׃ <sup>4213 </sup> <n>and few</n>
7: אָבַ֥ל <sup>56 </sup> <n>mourneth</n> תִּיר֖וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>The new wine</n> אֻמְלְלָה־ <sup>535 </sup> <n>languisheth</n> גָ֑פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>the vine</n> נֶאֶנְח֖וּ <sup>584 </sup> <n>do sigh</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> שִׂמְחֵי־ <sup>8056 </sup> <n>glad</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>care for</n>
8: שָׁבַת֙ <sup>7673 </sup> <n>ceaseth</n> מְשׂ֣וֹשׂ <sup>4885 </sup> <n>The mirth</n> תֻּפִּ֔ים <sup>8596 </sup> <n>of tabrets</n> חָדַ֖ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>endeth</n> שְׁא֣וֹן <sup>7588 </sup> <n>the noise</n> עַלִּיזִ֑ים <sup>5947 </sup> <n>of them that rejoice</n> שָׁבַ֖ת <sup>7673 </sup> <n>ceaseth</n> מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <sup>4885 </sup> <n>the joy</n> כִּנּֽוֹר׃ <sup>3658 </sup> <n>of the harp</n>
9: בַּשִּׁ֖יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>with a song</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִשְׁתּוּ־ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>They shall not drink</n> יָ֑יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>wine</n> יֵמַ֥ר <sup>4843 </sup> <n>shall be bitter</n> שֵׁכָ֖ר <sup>7941 </sup> <n>strong drink</n> לְשֹׁתָֽיו׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>to them that drink</n>
10: נִשְׁבְּרָ֖ה <sup>7665 </sup> <n>is broken down</n> קִרְיַת־ <sup>7151 </sup> <n>The city</n> תֹּ֑הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>of confusion</n> סֻגַּ֥ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>is shut up</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Every</n> בַּ֖יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>every house</n> מִבּֽוֹא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>that no man may come in</n>
11: צְוָחָ֥ה <sup>6682 </sup> <n>[There is] a crying</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הַיַּ֖יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>for wine</n> בַּֽחוּצ֑וֹת <sup>2351 </sup> <n>in the streets</n> עָֽרְבָה֙ <sup>6150 </sup> <n>is darkened</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> שִׂמְחָ֔ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>all joy</n> גָּלָ֖ה <sup>1540 </sup> <n>is gone</n> מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <sup>4885 </sup> <n>the mirth</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n>
